attributes.action: Intervene and reverse Alun Johnson's decision to extradite Garry McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Garry has a severe form of Autism and he will not be safe or have his needs met if extradited to the US.  The UK / UK extradition agreement mitigares against UK citizens and our politicans should protect the human rights of this vulnerable person.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases. The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
